Html:
This has proberbly been asked before but I couldn't find any threads to see the results, so apologies if this is a repeated request.

I imagine every class and nearly every spec needs a stamina set for certain situations. For most of us, its simply a case of throwing on a few PvP items for certain raid fights like Najentus but it occured to me that RAWR might be able to help with planning a +sta set that doesnt gimp our role too much. Sure, we can try on items and see the results and mess around with the gear that way but is there a more scientific or logical method for selecting and planning the +sta set?

Cheers

Pacha

Many Rawr modules allow you to set optimizable constraint for health. When you're in optimizer screen just add a constraint and specify how much health you want and it will optimize your character with respect to that constraint.
